trans-unit.source: Provides the implementation for the binary client formatter sink provider.
trans-unit.target: Gir implementeringen for binære klienten formatering sink leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: A BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider creates client formatter sinks that use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> to serialize messages for the client channel through which remoting messages flow.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider klienten formatering mottakere som bruker den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>til å serialisere meldinger for klienten kanalen meldinger strømmer gjennom som ekstern kommunikasjon.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: The function of the formatter sink is to generate the necessary headers and serialize the message to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Funksjonen formatering mottakeren er generere hodene som er nødvendig for å serialisere meldingen til dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: After the formatter sink, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> is forwarded to all sinks in the channel sink chain through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Etter at mottakeren formatering av <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>videresendes til alle mottakere i kanal sink kjede gjennom den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A>eller <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A>kall.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>

trans-unit.source: At this stage, the message has already been serialized and is provided as information only.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen allerede er serialisert og er angitt som bare informasjon i denne fasen.

trans-unit.source: Sinks that need to create or modify the message must be placed in the sink chain before the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Mottakere trenger for å opprette eller endre meldingen må plasseres i sink-kjede før formateringen.

trans-unit.source: You can do this by implementing both the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette ved å implementere både den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>og <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink>grensesnitt.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>

trans-unit.source: The formatter sink can then be placed in the sink chain later.
trans-unit.target: Formatering mottakeren kan deretter plasseres i sink-kjede senere.

trans-unit.source: Formatter sinks use sink configuration properties to configure the channel at run time.
trans-unit.target: Formatering mottakere Bruk sink konfigurasjonsegenskaper til å konfigurere kanalen på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: Sink properties can be specified in a configuration file, or programmatically, inside of a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Sink egenskaper kan angis i en konfigurasjonsfil eller programmatisk inne i en <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: In a configuration file all values are represented by strings, but when building a property <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> programmatically, value types can be specified with their native values or with strings.
trans-unit.target: I en konfigurasjonsfil for alle verdier som representeres av strenger, men når du bygger en egenskap <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>programmatisk verdityper kan angis med de opprinnelige verdiene eller strenger.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sink configuration properties that can be specified for the current sink provider.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser mottakeren egenskapene for konfigurasjonen som kan angis for sink gjeldende leverandør.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | `includeVersions`| Angir om formateringen inneholder informasjon om versjonskontroll.

trans-unit.source: Values are `true` or `false`.| > [!IMPORTANT] > Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: Verdier er `true` eller `false`. | > [!IMPORTANT] > Med en forekomst av dette objektet med uklarerte data eller i en usikker kanal er en sikkerhetsrisiko.

trans-unit.source: Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel.
trans-unit.target: Bruk dette objektet bare klarerte og over en sikker kanal.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [uklarerte Data sikkerhetsrisiko](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"> </xref> klasse standardverdier.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref> class with the given properties and provider data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"> </xref> klassen med de angitte egenskapene og leverandøren dataene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of configuration properties to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>av egenskapene for konfigurasjonen til å bruke med den nye forekomsten av <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"></xref> objects that contain provider data to use with the new instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>av <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SinkProviderData"> </xref> objekter som inneholder leverandøren dataene som skal brukes med den nye forekomsten av <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSinkProvider"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates a sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en sink-kjede.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A> method is called, it creates its own channel sink, forwards the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A> call to the next sink provider in the chain (if there is one), and ensures that the next sink and the current one are linked together.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A>-metoden, opprettes det en egen kanal sink, videresending av <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A>kall til neste sink leverandøren i kjeden (Hvis det finnes et), og sikrer at den neste sink og denne er koblet sammen.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider.CreateSink%2A>

trans-unit.source: Channel for which this sink chain is being constructed.
trans-unit.target: Kanal for denne sink kjeden blir opprettet.

trans-unit.source: URL of object to connect to or the channel URI for the target object.
trans-unit.target: URL-adresse for objektet som kobles til eller URI for kanalen målobjektet.

trans-unit.source: A channel data object that describes a channel on the remote server.
trans-unit.target: En kanal data-objekt som beskriver en kanal på den eksterne serveren.

trans-unit.source: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this provider will not or cannot provide a connection for this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Første mottakeren av nylig utformet kanal sink-kjede eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne leverandøren vil ikke eller kan ikke angi en tilkobling for dette sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref> in the sink provider chain.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir neste <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"> </xref> i sink leverandøren kjeden.

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref> in the sink provider chain.
trans-unit.target: Neste <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"> </xref> i sink leverandøren kjeden.
